lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter scored 26 points to lift the Phoenix Mercury to a victory against the San Antonio Silver Stars in Game 1 of the W.N.B.A.’s Western Conference finals.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter scored 26 points to lift the Phoenix Mercury to a victory against the San Antonio Silver Stars in Game 1 of the W.N.B.A.’s Western Conference finals.
